name: Scallywag: In the Lair of the Medusa
name_original: Scallywag: In the Lair of the Medusa
description:
Scallywag: In the Lair of the Medusa is an action-RPG game developed by Chronic Reality. It was originally released in 2007. Shrapnel Games published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Scallywag: In the Lair of the Medusa is available on PC.
